job.title: Software Engineer - Apple Cloud Product Services
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brAre you passionate about building largescale distributed services Do you want to work with technologies that impact hundreds of millions of users around the world Are you interested in solving sophisticated problems that can have a direct impact on the success of the company Do you love building applications that operate at this level of scale and complexitybrbrbr If the answer to these are yes then come join the group of software engineers behind the backend services that support our Apple Cloud Products What we do is essential sophisticated exciting and highly rewardingbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brExperience designing implementing and supporting highly scalable applications and web servicesbrbrbr Experience with SQL and NoSQL database technologiesbrbrbr Multithreaded or eventdriven programmingbrbrbrExcellent analytical and problem solving skillsbrbrbrExcellent written and interpersonal skillsbrbrbrAptitude to independently learn new technologiesbrbrbrAbility to design develop and deploy large scale applicationsbrbrbrBe able to drive a project from a simple idea to an implementationbrbrbrBe an authority who possesses both strong programming skills and a creative userfocused demeanorbrbrbrAbility to thrive in a multifunctional team on high profile critical projectsbrbrbrExperience with data pipelines and processing large data setsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brWe are looking for a deeply capable engineer who has a strong background in designing implementing and supporting large scale web services This is a highly visible position with significant ownership of projects The position requires collaboration with multiple multifunctional engineering teams to define implement and maintain some of the core backend web services that will support the next generation of Apple services and Cloud ProductsbrbrbrThe focus of our organization is on application backend where we have ownership of web services behind some of Apples largest ecosystemsbrbrbriCloud Drive providing documentbased APIs and services to keep customer documents in sync across their devicesbrbrbrApple News a platform that delivers content around the globe for Apple News News and StocksbrbrbrEfficiency apps for collaboration such as Apple Notes and the suite of iWork appsbrbrbrThe work is sophisticated complicated highimpact and highly visible It involves crafting data models picking the appropriate data store resolving data flows between client and data store APIs that support multiple features as well as developing and deploying web services used by several millions of Apple devices Our team has the ownership of the entire lifecycle of application data from the critical portions of what enables apps to work well at Apple scale to the work that happens behind the scenes including asynchronous jobs and data processingbrbrbrOur team is looking for hardworking and passionate engineers who want to make a difference in the products they develop If you feel this is you wed love to hear from youbrbrbrApple is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants including minorities women protected veterans and individuals with disabilities Apple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about disclose or discuss their compensation or that of other applicantsbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong br  BS or MS or Phd in Computer Science or equivalent shown experiencebrbr brRole Number 200228271brbr
